text: Technology Will Save Us is a company that makes DIY gadget kits. They have collaborated with the BBC on the Micro Bit http://techwillsaveus.com The company was founded in 2012 in London, England by Bethany Koby and Daniel Hirschmann.https://www.techwillsaveus.com/about-us/press/ Koby stated that the idea to start the company came after Koby and Hirschmann found a discarded laptop and were inspired to look at the modern consumer's relationship with technology. ==References== Category:Companies based in the London Borough of Tower Hamlets Category:Technology companies based in London
title: Technology Will Save Us
